reward-npc-visit: üéÅ Visit the reward NPC to claim your rewards!

npc.level-requirement: %COLOR_ERROR%You need to be level %COLOR_YELLOW%{level}%COLOR_ERROR% or higher to accept this quest!
npc.job-requirement: %COLOR_ERROR%You need to be a %COLOR_YELLOW%{job}%COLOR_ERROR% to accept this quest!
npc.mutually-exclusive: %COLOR_ERROR%You have already completed a mutually exclusive quest!

first-steps.name: First Steps
description: Let's learn basic movement and interaction.

dialogs.line1: Hello, adventurer! Welcome to Sypixel RPG!
dialogs.line2: This world is filled with countless adventures and treasures waiting for you.
dialogs.line3: Let's start with the basics, shall we? Head to the Hub, then find the village merchant.
dialogs.accept: Great! Let's explore this world together.
dialogs.decline: Please come back when you're ready.

dialogs.essential_skills: Combat skills are essential to become an adventurer!
dialogs.night_monsters: Monsters appear at night. Be prepared!
dialogs.return_reward: Defeat zombies and skeletons, then return for better equipment.

raid_boss.name: Weekly Raid: Fortress of Chaos
description: The highest difficulty raid dungeon that resets weekly.
Defeat the Chaos Lord and his minions to earn legendary rewards!
‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING: This raid is very difficult!

objectives.darkness_trial: Survive the Darkness Trial for 5 minutes

world_boss.name: World Titan Subjugation
description: The entire server must unite to defeat the ancient Titan!
This week's Titan: Chaos, Lord of Discord

heroes_journey.name: Hero's Journey
description: The first step to becoming a true hero.
Prove your skills through various challenges!
This quest allows multiple objectives to progress simultaneously.
Complete them at your own pace.

path_of_light.name: ‚ú¶ Path of Light
description: Walk the path of justice and goodness.
Path of Darkness cannot be selected!

path_of_darkness.name: ‚ú¶ Path of Darkness
info: Walk the path of power and domination.
Path of Light cannot be selected!

dialog.line1: Dark Priest: Do you seek power? True power lies in darkness.
dialog.line2: Dark Priest: Dominate the weak and become the true master of this world.
dialog.line3: Dark Priest: Be warned, if you choose this path, everyone will become your enemy.

guardian_awakening.name: Guardian's Awakening
info: The ancient guardians lie in deep slumber.
Awaken them and pass their trials to gain the guardian's power.
This quest includes an important choice that will determine your destiny.
‚Ä¢ Guardian of Light - Power of healing and protection
‚Ä¢ Guardian of Darkness - Power of destruction and absorption
‚Ä¢ Guardian of Balance - Power of harmony and transformation

dialog.line1: Ancient Scholar: Finally, the time has come. The time spoken of in the ancient prophecy...
dialog.line2: Ancient Scholar: While the guardians slumber, the world is losing its balance.
dialog.line3: Player: Can we awaken the guardians?
dialog.line4: Ancient Scholar: It's possible. But to awaken them, we need the essence of four elements.
dialog.line5: Sleeping Guardian: Who... disturbs... my slumber...
dialog.line6: Sleeping Guardian: Ah... the child of prophecy. But if you seek my power, you must prove yourself.
dialog.line7: Awakened Guardian: I respect your choice. Now you are worthy of the guardian's blessing.
dialog.line8: Awakened Guardian: Use this power wisely. The fate of the world rests in your hands.

ancient_prophecy.name: The Ancient Prophecy
info: An ancient prophecy speaks of a hero who will save the world.
Seek the Elder to learn the truth of the prophecy.
‚Ä¢ Deliver scrolls to the Ancient Elder

objectives.deliver_scrolls: Deliver scrolls to the Ancient Elder

dialog.line1: Ancient Elder: Ah... The child of prophecy has finally appeared.
dialog.line2: Ancient Elder: A thousand years ago, a great sage left a prophecy.
dialog.line3: Ancient Elder: When darkness covers the world, a warrior of light shall appear...
dialog.line4: Ancient Elder: But the prophecy scrolls are scattered. Gather them all and I will reveal the truth.

chosen_one.name: Trial of the Chosen One
info: The prophecy says you are the chosen one.
But you must prove your worth.
Pass three trials and become a true hero:
‚Ä¢ Trial of Courage - Face powerful enemies
‚Ä¢ Trial of Wisdom - Solve ancient puzzles
‚Ä¢ Trial of Sacrifice - Willingly give up what's precious
All trials must be completed sequentially.
‚Ä¢ Solve the Puzzle of Wisdom (5 Redstone Lamps)
‚Ä¢ Offer 1000 gold at the Altar of Sacrifice
‚Ä¢ Obtain the Emblem of the Chosen
‚Ä¢ Deliver emblem to the Ancient Elder

hunting.name: Daily Hunting
hunting.description:
Complete today's hunting objectives.
Resets daily at midnight.

gathering.name: Daily Gathering
gathering.description:
Gather today's required resources.
Resets daily at midnight.

fishing.name: Daily Fishing
fishing.description:
Complete today's fishing objectives.
Resets daily at midnight.

mining.name: Daily Mining
mining.description:
Complete today's mining objectives.
Resets daily at midnight.

crafting.name: Daily Craftsman's Work
description: The blacksmith has requested various item crafts.

dialogs.start1: Orders are piling up again today. Can you help?
dialogs.player_question: Of course! What should I make?
dialogs.start2: I need tools, armor, and daily necessities. I'll give you a detailed list.
dialogs.progress1: How's the crafting going? Let me know if you need materials.
dialogs.chainmail_question: How do I craft chainmail armor?
dialogs.chainmail_answer: You need to arrange iron nuggets in a special pattern. It's difficult work.
dialogs.complete1: Amazing! You've completed all orders perfectly. You're a true craftsman!
dialogs.complete2: Take these tools. I'd appreciate your help again tomorrow!

exploration_simple.name: Daily Exploration
exploration_simple.description:
Explore new areas and discover secrets.
Resets daily at midnight.

daily_delivery.name: Daily Express Delivery
description: Deliver urgent supplies throughout the village!
You must deliver items to 6 different locations.
‚Ä¢ Guard Post delivery must be completed within 5 minutes
‚Ä¢ All deliveries must be done in order

dialogs.start1: I need a fast and accurate delivery person! Many urgent items today.
dialogs.start2: You need to deliver items to 6 different locations. The guard post is especially urgent!
dialogs.baker_thanks: Exactly 10 loaves of bread! Thank you!
dialogs.pharmacist_thanks: I can make important potions with these materials. Thanks!
dialogs.guard_thanks: You arrived on time! We can defend the village with these weapons!
dialogs.complete1: Excellent! All deliveries completed perfectly. Please help again tomorrow!
dialogs.complete2: Take these special boots. You'll be able to move faster!

exploration_detailed.name: Daily Unknown Lands Exploration
description: Accept the Explorer's Guild request and explore unknown lands!
Explore 5 different regions and write a report.
‚Ä¢ Abandoned Mine - Old minerals and relics
‚Ä¢ Hidden Waterfall - Rare fish and treasures
‚Ä¢ Ancient Ruins - Traces of forgotten civilization
‚Ä¢ Mystic Forest - Magic plants and herbs
‚Ä¢ Lava Cavern - Volcanic minerals and danger
‚Ä¢ Catch rare fish at hidden waterfall

dialogs.start1: Adventurer! Are you ready to explore unknown lands today?
dialogs.start2: 5 new regions have been discovered. Explore each area and write a report.
dialogs.regions: Abandoned mine, hidden waterfall, ancient ruins, mystic forest, and lava cavern.
dialogs.supplies: Do you have enough supplies? Be especially careful in the lava cavern.
dialogs.discovery: I found rare fish at the waterfall!
dialogs.record: Excellent! Record all such discoveries in your report.
dialogs.complete1: You've explored all regions! Your report contains very valuable information.
dialogs.complete2: These maps will be of great help to other explorers. Well done!
dialogs.complete3: New regions will be waiting tomorrow too. Keep exploring!

fishing_detailed.name: Daily Fishing
description: This is a daily quest that resets every day.

dialogs.greeting: Hello! Are you here to fish again today?
dialogs.daily_reward: I give rewards for catching fish every day.
dialogs.targets: Please catch any 10 fish, 5 salmon, and 2 pufferfish!
dialogs.come_back: Come back tomorrow for the same rewards!

gathering_detailed.name: Daily Resource Gathering
description: Gather various resources needed for the village.
Resets daily and can be repeated.

dialogs.start1: Ah, perfect timing! The village is low on resources and needs help.
dialogs.start2: Wood, stone, minerals, and food... we need everything.
dialogs.list: I'll give you a list. Gather everything you can. We especially need iron.
dialogs.crops: It would be great if you could harvest crops too. The villagers are hungry.
dialogs.player_accept: Got it. I'll start right away!
dialogs.thanks: Thanks! When you've gathered everything, bring it back in a chest.

dialogs.greeting: Hello! Are you here to mine again today?
dialogs.need_resources: Today's quota is 50 stone, 20 coal, and 10 iron.
dialogs.player_accept: Got it. I'll start right away!

bounty-hunter.name: Daily Bounty Hunt
description: Track and eliminate today's bounty targets!
Dangerous criminals and monsters await you.
‚Ä¢ Each target spawns in specific areas

dialogs.start1: Another bounty hunter? Today we have particularly dangerous targets.
dialogs.start2: Four bounties are posted. Complete them all for a substantial reward.
dialogs.targets: Bandits, mutant monsters, dark wizards, and... one special target.
dialogs.informant1: Want to know the elite target's location? 500 gold and it's yours.
dialogs.informant2: Hiding in an abandoned fortress. But be careful, heavily guarded.
dialogs.complete1: Impressive! Did you handle all targets?
dialogs.player_complete: Yes, I've brought all the evidence too.
dialogs.complete2: Perfect! Here's your promised bounty. Come back tomorrow for new targets.
dialogs.complete3: Skilled hunters are always welcome. Here's some good equipment as bonus.

spring-festival.name: Spring Festival Joy
description: Help prepare for the Spring Festival!
Collect flowers and decorate the festival grounds
so everyone can have a good time.

objectives.deliver_decorations: Deliver decorations to the Festival Host

ancient_power.name: Blessings of Forgotten Gods
description: Receive blessings from 5 ancient gods of legend
and embark on a secret journey to obtain ultimate power.

start.line1: After ages... I knew someone would find this place...
start.line2: Do you seek the gods' blessings? The path is arduous and dangerous.
start.line4: Visit the 5 ancient gods and receive their blessings. When all blessings become one...

dialog.war_god: You seek battle? Survive in endless war!
dialog.wisdom_god: Knowledge is power. But all knowledge comes with a price.
dialog.nature_god: Become one with nature. Be a creator, not a destroyer.
dialog.death_god: Only those who do not fear death gain true life.
dialog.time_god: Past and future, and present... all time is one.
dialog.convergence: You've gathered all blessings. Now merge them into one.
dialog.awakening: Do you feel it? The ancient power is awakening!

complete.line1: Congratulations... You are now blessed by the gods.
complete.line2: Use this power wisely. Your mission is to maintain the world's balance.

dimension_traveler.name: Guardian of Dimensions
description: Seal the rifts in the multiverse and restore dimensional balance!
Travel through 6 unstable dimensions and seal each dimensional rift.
‚Ä¢ Mirror World - Dimension where everything is reversed
‚Ä¢ Frozen Time - World where time stopped
‚Ä¢ Dreams and Nightmares - Border of reality and fantasy
‚Ä¢ Pure Void - Space of absolute nothingness

start.line1: A great crisis has come to the multiverse. Rifts between dimensions are forming.
start.line2: Only you can seal these rifts. You must travel through 6 dimensions.
start.line4: Mirror, zero gravity, frozen time, elemental chaos, dreams and nightmares, and... pure void.

dialog.mirror_world: In the mirror world, everything is reversed. You might have to fight yourself.
dialog.zero_gravity: Zero gravity space makes you lose direction easily. Install gravity anchors.
dialog.frozen_time: In frozen time, only you can move. But staying too long is dangerous.
dialog.elemental_chaos: Where four elements collide. You must balance them to seal the rift.
dialog.dream_realm: The dream realm mixes reality and fantasy. Keep your mind clear.
dialog.pure_void: Pure void is... nothing. You must endure that nothingness.

dimension_merge.line1: You've sealed all rifts! Now we must stabilize the dimensions.
dimension_merge.line2: Endure 40 minutes of dimension merge. Failure means all dimensions collapse.

complete.line1: You did it! The multiverse is stable! You are the true Guardian of Dimensions!
complete.line2: Take these dimension portals. Now you can travel freely through all dimensions.

hidden_class.name: Path of Shadows
description: There is a path that can only be seen in darkness.
Pass the secret trials of the Shadow Guild and obtain a hidden class.
‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING: This quest is very dangerous and includes PvP.
Once started, there's no turning back.

start.line1: If you're reading this letter, you are chosen...
start.line2: At midnight, knock three times with a stick at the abandoned well.

master.line1: It's been long since someone with potential arrived. Are you ready to walk the path of shadows?
master.line2: This path cannot be undone. Once you step in, you must go to the end.
master.line4: Good. Let's start with the first trial. Learn to become a true shadow.

dialog.progress: Impressive. But the real test begins now.
dialog.assassination: Eliminate the corrupt noble. Bring his seal as proof.

choice.line1: You've passed all trials. Now it's time to choose your path.
choice.line2: Shadow Assassin, Dark Sorcerer, Night Stalker... What will you become?

complete.line1: Now you are one of us. Receive the Shadow Mark.
complete.line2: This mark is your new identity. Use it wisely.

legendary_weapon.name: Forging the Legendary Weapon
description: Embark on an epic journey to forge the legendary weapon of myths.
Gather four divine materials to create the ultimate weapon.

mythic_beast.name: Encounter with Mythic Beings
description: Journey to find the mythical beings that exist only in legends
and gain special powers through your encounters with them.

world_tree.name: Revival of the World Tree
description: An epic saga to revive the dying World Tree Yggdrasil!
Purify the five roots and restore the power of life.

ancient_cipher.name: Secrets of Ancient Civilization
description: Decode the ancient cipher engraved on a mysterious tablet
and discover the treasures of a lost civilization!
‚Ä¢ Observe stars for 10 minutes at night

objectives.night_observation: Observe stars for 10 minutes at night

archaeologist.line1: Finally found it! The ancient tablet that was only known in legends!
archaeologist.line2: But this cipher... I can't decode it with my abilities. Will you help?
archaeologist.line3: According to ancient texts, we need 4 keys. Each hidden in different places.
archaeologist.line4: Amazing! You've gathered all the keys! Now we can decode the cipher!
archaeologist.line5: The cipher points to... a hidden chamber beneath this lab!
archaeologist.line6: Hurry! The mummies are awakening! We must escape!
archaeologist.line7: Truly amazing! This artifact will revolutionize ancient civilization research!
archaeologist.line8: Take these rewards. And... could you help solve other mysteries too?

librarian.line1: Shh... keep quiet. Dangerous knowledge sleeps in this library.
librarian.line2: Looking for the Key of Knowledge? Search the bookshelves in the forbidden section.

ghost_alchemist.line1: A visitor after so long... do you seek the Key of Change?
ghost_alchemist.line2: Complete my unfinished experiment and I'll give you the key.

blacksmith_apprentice.name: The Blacksmith's Apprentice
description: The village blacksmith is looking for a new apprentice.
Learn the blacksmith's craft and begin the path of a craftsman.
üî® Through this quest, you can learn basic smithing skills.
‚Ä¢ Stage 1: Gather basic materials and prepare workshop
‚Ä¢ Stage 3: Weapon crafting and quality testing

objectives.deliver_special: Deliver special order to Knight Captain

blacksmith.line1: Ah, young one! Are you interested in smithing work?
blacksmith.line2: I'm getting old and working alone has become difficult. I've been looking for an apprentice...
blacksmith.line3: Good! I'll teach you from the basics. Gather coal and iron, then we'll begin.
blacksmith.line4: Excellent! You've done well with the tools. Now it's time to make weapons.
blacksmith.line5: Weapons require more refined techniques than tools. Balance and sharpness are crucial.
blacksmith.line6: The Knight Captain has ordered a special sword. This will be your final test.
blacksmith.line7: A sword made of diamond. You'll need to use your best techniques.
blacksmith.line8: I'm so proud! You're now a true blacksmith.
blacksmith.line9: Take this manual. It contains all the knowledge I've gathered in my lifetime.

collect_herbs.name: Collect Herbs
description: The alchemist is looking for herbs.

alchemist.line1: Hello, adventurer. Are you skilled in herb gathering?
alchemist.line2: I need special ingredients to create new potions.
alchemist.line3: If you bring me 15 dandelions, 10 poppies, 10 azure bluets, and 5 spider eyes, I'll reward you.

farmers_request.name: Farmer's Request
description: Please harvest crops and deliver them.

farmer.line1: Hello! Adventurer, can you help me?
farmer.line2: I have too many crops to harvest alone.
farmer.line3: If you harvest 30 wheat, 20 carrots, and 20 potatoes for me, I'll give you a reward!

lost_treasure.name: Lost Treasure
description: Find the treasure marked on the old map.
You must visit three locations in order.

explorer.line1: Look at this old map. It's said to lead to a legendary treasure.
explorer.line2: I'm too old to search for it myself.
explorer.line3: Visit the three marked locations in order, and you'll find the treasure.
explorer.line4: When you find the treasure, keep some for yourself. Just bring me the rest.

halloween_night.name: The Cursed Night of Halloween
info: Once a year, on Halloween night when ghosts awaken!
Accept the Pumpkin King's challenge and save the village.
‚Ä¢ Pumpkin farming and Jack o'Lantern crafting

spring_festival.name: Joy of Spring Festival
info: Spring has come! We're planning a spring festival in the village. Would you like to help?
Gather flowers and decorate the festival area!

monster_extermination.name: Monster Extermination Mission
info: You can challenge this quest again anytime.

arena_gladiator.name: Glory of the Arena
info: Prove your combat skills in the arena!
Fight against other gladiators and become the champion.
‚Ä¢ Must pass each round to proceed

guild_establishment.name: Path of Guild Foundation
info: Create your own guild and become a Guild Master!
Start bigger adventures with your companions.

dialogs.line1: The World Boss event has begun!
dialogs.line2: This week, Chaos the Lord of Discord will appear. The entire server must unite.
dialogs.line4: First, prepare the summoning ritual. We need crystals, essence, and many warriors.
dialogs.line5: When the ritual begins, the Titan's legion will appear first. Be ready!
dialogs.line6: Amazing! You've repelled the first wave! But this is just the beginning.
dialogs.line7: The Four Elemental Generals have appeared! Beware the powers of fire, ice, earth, and wind!
dialogs.line8: Finally... the Titan has awakened! Focus all firepower!
dialogs.line9: The Titan is changing forms! Each phase requires different strategies!
dialogs.line10: Unbelievable... you really defeated the Titan! Heroes of the server!
dialogs.line11: These rewards are payment for your courage. Next week, an even stronger Titan will come.

dialogs.start_adventure: Start your adventure in this world.
dialogs.first_objective: Great! Let me tell you your first objective.
